10374917.title: The Don (The View song)
10374917.extract: "The Don" is the fourth single by Dundee band The View. It was released on 23 April 2007 as a double A-side along with "Skag Trendy". It follows the singles "Wasted Little DJs", "Superstar Tradesman" and "Same Jeans", and is taken from the debut album Hats Off to the Buskers. The single reached number 33 in the UK Singles Chart, the band's final UK top 40 single.
